alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 9:12PM EST until January 11 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent heavy rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause rises in the river with multiple locations rising above flood stage this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY, JANUARY 11... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, January 11. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 38.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.7 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, January 11. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
